name: mrsmuckles
text: On accident , people!

name: gothfae
text: And that's actually about a quarter...

name: ted0phile
text: With Ray, about is sort of vague.

name: canusdivinus
text: About a pound.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: 45 degrees.

name: sweetlips
text: That's probably what the Conservative shoe is about to tell him.

name: the_meek
text: You're running with the assumption the paper was originally rectangular.

name: thommy_h
text: This is my favourite Achewood line ever. He ate half a piece of paper 'on accident' - how is that possible? What was he doing? Amazing.

name: tomsmith
text: Maybe the paper had a hotdog in it.

name: heyman
text: A comment left by heyman was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Thorfinn, GSurge, DiamondMonster, trisha, andrew_k, misterkoss, PoodleLucy, littlefatdog)

name: peng33
text: the snozzberries that I... boned?

name: soticoto
text: *Starts typing up a Yahoo Personals ad for peng33*

name: evolume
text: Well this weekend I was drunk and accidentally brushed my teeth with NeoSporin.

name: twohundredninety
text: Ew. Dude. I'm sorry, man.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: I been there, most absolutely. No good at all.

name: thorfinn
text: Under similar circumstances (intoxication), I once brushed my teeth with liquid hand soap by accident, I knew putting it next to the Mentadent was a bad idea

name: salo
text:
I did that once as well, while accidentally sober.
Never again.

name: heccibiggs
text:
An uncle of mine - while sober - instead of toothpaste used depilatory cream.

aka Immac/Veet

aka PUBE REMOVER.

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
OH MY GOD NO.

That stuff fucking burns! Oh god that's terrible.

name: atticusonline
text: OK what the hell...If i brush my teeth with pube remover I sure as hell ain't gonna tell anyone.

name: cbtbone
text: ok, but what do you say when someone asks you where all the hair on your teeth went?

name: atticusonline
text: touche

name: jlynes
text: Dude.  I just fucking snorted.  Chubby for you.

name: jezebel
text: I once had a small, travel-sized bottle of perfume in my purse.  I also had breath spray.  The ensuing disaster makes me gag to this day.  That was 4 years ago.

name: bixschmix
text: I once accidentally confused eardrops with eyedrops. I ended up calling poison control because it stung so bad. No blindness though. HUUUUUGS!

name: achilleselbow
text: When I was in Munich, I ran out of toothpaste and had to go to the store to buy some more. I bought a bottle of what I was sure was toothpaste, had a picture of a tooth on it and everything. When it tasted like ass and wouldn't wash off, I realized that it was in fact denture cream.

name: neonaoneo
text: Eugh

name: sweetlips
text: I've brushed my teeth with zit cream, completely sober.

name: dj_douche
text: Gargled Betadine once while inebriated at a friend's. Thought it was mouthwash. What else comes in a plus-size green bottle and sits on the bathroom shelf? (Apparently Betadine does.) All hacking and gagging up dark red stuff. Looked like something from the Texas Chainsaw Massacre.

name: greenkoolayd
text: would have been rad if you had had infected gums.

name: joeyramoney
text: it had a drawing of a hot dog on it and he got confused.

name: joeyramoney
text: i apologize to tomsmith, in retrospect that was a poor choice of food.

name: spinynorman
text: He is so pumped to have eaten that paper.

name: budenhagen
text: I've always been under the assumption that he was meaning to eat less than half of the paper, but accidentally ate about half.

name: scifigrl47
text: My brother once mistook the little bottle of hotel hand lotion for shampoo.  That was some hella nasty hair.

name: zaratustra
text: how the hell does a shoe show promise as an artist

name: aaron_haynes
text: Maybe Lazarus is like the Rembrandt of shoes that can paint.

name: slalvation
text: You get a chubby for TOTALLY not answering that question.

name: songbirdspectre
text: the words. they make NO sense.

name: carten
text: A comment left by carten was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by madnes, trialandterror, mistlethrush)

name: fineoakstructure
text: goggles.

name: stuart
text: My assumption was that they had undergone a sort of Frog Prince transformation.

name: choosebro
text: Tap dancing.

name: patkun
text: THIS is why Achewood is so brilliant. In two panels, Onstad creates an intriguing, emotional story about a boy's relationship with his father...and forgets totally about it ffive strips later.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Lazarus is making the loudest sigh a shoe can utter right now.

name: darthemed
text:
It's hard to sigh
Without a tongue

name: centipede_damascus
text: Shoes have tongues man. What kind of shoe are you wearin

name: darthemed
text: Honestly, I thought that separating the pun from the rest of the comment would highlight it for the people who couldn't get it otherwise. I was wrong~

name: tttt
text: using 'with a tongue' in some way would have been a pun

name: dovey
text: Do loafers have a tongue as such?

name: relaxing
text: no not as such

name: songbirdspectre
text: what as such?

name: relaxing
text: tongues as such that a lace-up shoe would have.

name: slalvation
text:
you don't use a tongue when you sigh

it is merely an exhalation of breath.

name: mikekitchell
text: considering how much grammar speech and such gets thrown around these comments i'm surprised nobody has commented on how it should be by accident.

name: unfun
text:
Well, it's Ray.

Also, I just gave you a chubby on accident.

name: stuart
text: Yeah, Ray pretty much has free license to reinvent the language as he sees fit.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: i was about to

name: ovenface
text: shit, i always say 'on accident'.

name: dickie_roxx
text: The "on accident" is what makes it hilarious. Not only has Ray eaten a non-edible thing, not only is he bragging about it, but he's using a blatantly wrong construction to talk about it. Hat trick of 8-year-old-ness

name: cpnglxynchos
text: completely

name: riazm
text: These are some passive agressive fucking shoes!

name: ovenface
text: these alt texts are my favorites

name: wigglestick
text: I kind of imagine that Leopold already somewhat knows Ray by reputation... His question in panel 6 is rhatorical, because he knows that, no indeed, this will not be difficult.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: maybe he's knocking T in a way, questioning his Abilities to do a thing.

name: thegoodwillgirl
text:
I gave this one a five, based solely on the last panel. Without that panel, it probably would've been about a three.

Come to think of it, that last panel could really just be its own comic and I'd be pleased.

name: joeldebunchastu
text: To be honest, though, Ray is not being tricked, he is being badass

name: dasilodavi
text: It kind of begs the question, what IS Lucien?  A tasteful pair of pants?  A pair of those wedges you put in shoes so they keep their shape?  A leather tanning kit?

name: mr-siegal
text:
Begs the question?

The grammar police are on their way, I hear the siren.

name: carlyle
text: Hee hee! Oh, hee hee!

name: foiegrastaco
text: One of my mom's favorite other-people-isms is saying 'on accident' instead of the correct 'by accident', and for some reason the last panel has always been my most powerful mental indicator of how Ray's voice sounds.
